name: whatsapp-mcp
description: Connect Claude to your personal WhatsApp account. Search messages, contacts, send messages and media files directly from Claude.
longDescription: This MCP server enables Claude to interact with your personal WhatsApp account through the WhatsApp Web API. Features include searching through message history, finding contacts, sending text messages and media files (images, videos, documents, audio), and managing both individual and group conversations. All data is stored locally in SQLite and only accessed when you explicitly use the tools.

instructions: Or follow manual installation in README.md

tools.name: search_contacts
tools.description: Search WhatsApp contacts by name or phone number

tools.name: list_messages
tools.description: Get WhatsApp messages with filtering and context options

tools.name: list_chats
tools.description: List available WhatsApp chats with metadata

tools.name: get_chat
tools.description: Get information about a specific chat

tools.name: send_message
tools.description: Send a WhatsApp message to a person or group

tools.name: send_file
tools.description: Send media files (images, videos, documents) via WhatsApp

tools.name: send_audio_message
tools.description: Send audio files as WhatsApp voice messages

tools.name: get_message_context
tools.description: Get context around a specific message

tools.name: get_last_interaction
tools.description: Get most recent message with a contact

features: Send text messages and media files

security.dataHandling: All WhatsApp data is stored locally in SQLite database. No data is sent to external services except when explicitly requested through MCP tools.
security.authentication: Uses WhatsApp Web QR code authentication. Session data stored locally.
security.privacy: Direct connection to WhatsApp Web API. No third-party services involved.
